citations.narrative:
Three rabbits housed together in one hutch had excessive amounts of feces accumulated inside a litter box and other
areas of the hutch had feces and waste food build up. Excessive feces and food waste can lead to unsanitary conditions
and contribute to ill health and disease in rabbits. Enclosures need to be kept reasonably free of feces and other debris
by periodic cleaning and be sanitized every 30 days.
To be corrected by 5/20/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
Three rabbits housed together in one hutch had excessive amounts of feces accumulated inside a litter box and other 
areas of the hutch had feces and waste food build up.  Excessive feces and food waste can lead to unsanitary conditions 
and contribute to ill health and disease in rabbits.  Enclosures need to be kept reasonably free of feces and other debris 
by periodic cleaning and be sanitized every 30 days. 
To be corrected by 5/20/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
